item.title: [PI] Zytrex Scape - D defender/Pk Shop/And More! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

But there’s no need to make a Development if your just fixing/changing basic things.

A Development is mostly made when your Server doesn’t have much content nore initial features and you can see how it progresses, where as this is nearly complete. Inless you add something interesting like a new skill, then I suggest taking this down.
